1370: Engelbertus moved to Cromme straet.C.15 after marriage.
Got married to Heylewigis at age 21 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Heylewigis, Heylewigis, at age 21.
1371: Had a son with Heylewigis, Alard, at age 22.
1372: Had a daughter with Heylewigis, Amalburga, at age 23.
1373: Had a son with Heylewigis, Wolcout, at age 24.
1374: Had a son with Heylewigis, Bobone, at age 25.
1375: Lost daughter Amalburga when Amalburga was 4 years old.
1379: Became caretaker of Heylewigis, Alard, Wolcout, Bobone at age 31.
1394: Lost son Wolcout when Wolcout was 22 years old.
